body_html: The mean operation is still not implemented for several types as @weiyangfb mentions. However, in NumPy, those values are automatically converted to np.float64 when calculating their average values. Do you think it is better to have the same behavior of mean in PyTorch?
body_text: The mean operation is still not implemented for several types as @weiyangfb mentions. However, in NumPy, those values are automatically converted to np.float64 when calculating their average values. Do you think it is better to have the same behavior of mean in PyTorch?
body: The mean operation is still not implemented for several types as @weiyangfb mentions. However, in NumPy, those values are automatically converted to np.float64 when calculating their average values. Do you think it is better to have the same behavior of mean in PyTorch?
